Pemerintah Israel Terlibat dalam Pembobolan WhatsApp?
04 Nov 2019, 09:21 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Aplikasi WhatsApp. Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikINET

Jakarta - NSO Group sedang jadi pusat perhatian karena perusahaan keamanan asal Israel ini mampu menjebol WhatsApp dengan software canggih buatannya. Nah, apakah pemerintah Israel turut terlibat?WhatsApp menyebut setidaknya 1.400 penggunanya jadi korban dalam serangan yang terjadi bulan Mei itu. Software buatan NSO yang dijual ke klien seperti pemerintah dan intelijen amat hebat, bisa menyusup ke ponsel cukup dengan panggilan ke nomor WhatsApp, bahkan tanpa perlu diterima.Ketika ditanyakan, pemerintah Israel mengaku sama sekali tak terlibat dalam penyerangan ke WhatsApp itu. Menteri keamanan Israel, Zeev Elkin, menyebut NSO adalah perusahaan swasta dan harus bertanggung jawab atas perbuatannya."NSO adalah pemain swasta yang menggunakan kapabilitas yang dipunyai oleh Israel, yaitu ribuan orang yang ada di bidang siber," sebut Elkin yang dikutip detikINET dari Economic Times."Akan tetapi tidak ada keterlibatan dari pemerintah Israel, setiap orang memahami itu, hal ini bukanlah tentang negara Israel," tambah dia.Ia juga meyakini tidak akan ada masalah politik terkait ulah NSO. Mengenai tudingan WhatsApp pada NSO, ia menyerahkannya ke pengadilan."Benar bahwa jika orang melakukan sesuatu yang terlarang, sistem pengadilan di sini dan di negara lain akan menindak mereka," pungkasnya.Beberapa bulan melakukan investigasi, WhatsApp yakin NSO Group adalah dalang software canggih yang dipakai untuk menyerang. Meskipun serangan ini sangat mumpuni dan tersembunyi, WhatsApp tetap dapat melacak jejaknya.WhatsApp menyebut setidaknya ada 100 aktivis HAM, jurnalis dan masyarakat sipil lain jadi target. NSO Group sendiri membantah terlibat dalam serangan karena mereka menjual teknologinya ke pihak lain yang resmi. Tapi WhatsApp tak menerima penjelasan itu. Israeli Government Involved in Burglary WhatsApp?
Nov 04 2019, 09:21 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


WhatsApp application. Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikINET

Jakarta - NSO Group is the center of attention because this Israeli security company is able to break down WhatsApp with its sophisticated software. Now, is the Israeli government involved? WhatsApp said that at least 1,400 users were victims in the attack that occurred in May. NSO-made software that is sold to clients such as government and intelligence is very powerful, can infiltrate mobile phones simply by calling WhatsApp numbers, even without the need to receive them. When asked, the Israeli government claimed that it was not involved in the attack on WhatsApp. Israeli security minister, Zeev Elkin, said the NSO is a private company and must be held accountable for his actions. "NSO is a private player who uses the capabilities owned by Israel, which is thousands of people in the cyber field," Elkin was quoted as saying by the Economic Times "But there is no involvement from the Israeli government, everyone understands that, this is not about the state of Israel," he added. He also believes there will be no political problems related to the conduct of the NSO. Regarding WhatsApp's accusations on the NSO, he handed it over to the court. "It is true that if people do something that is forbidden, the court system here and in other countries will take action on them," he concluded. used to attack. Although this attack is very capable and hidden, WhatsApp is still able to trace it. WhatsApp said there were at least 100 human rights activists, journalists and other civil society targets. NSO Group itself denied involvement in the attack because they sold the technology to another official party. But WhatsApp did not accept that explanation.
